column4: alright one more question and ill leave ya'll alone.. i wanna set my laptop to have ubuntu 12.04 as the default start up instead of windows 7.. what do i need to change in the grub file? off hand?
with out me having the choice of picking?
it will just boot ubuntu up?
If you install ubuntu in a partition not a wubi install from windows its bootloader grub will be the boot and ubuntu is the default
